name.type.description: The content type of the Hailuo video to be generated, such as 'link', 'text', etc.

name.failure.description: The failure status of the task

name.failureReason.description: The reason for the task failure

name.traceId.description: The trace ID of the task

name.createdAt.description: The date and time the Hailuo video was generated

name.imageUrl.description: The reference image for the video to be generated

name.ingredients.description: Switch/label for creating videos with multiple images (keep it concise)

name.model.description: The model version used to generate the video

name.startImageUrl.description: The seed for the QR code to be generated

name.ingredientsModel.description: The model version used to generate the video

name.hailuoBot.description: The name of the Hailuo video generator

description.ingredients.message: Enable this button if you want to upload multiple images to create your video.

description.startImageUrl.message: The first frame image, which will be the first frame of the generated video.

description.prompt.message: The prompt words for generating the Hailuo video

status.pending.description: The pending status of the task

status.processing.description: The processing status of the task

placeholder.select.description: Placeholder text in the select field

placeholder.prompt.message: Enter the prompt for the video style, e.g., 'Fire'
placeholder.prompt.description: Placeholder text in the prompt field

button.model1.description: Button text for generating Hailuo video

button.model2.description: Button text for generating Hailuo video

button.generate.description: Button text for generating Hailuo video

button.uploadStartImageUrl.description: Button text for uploading image (simplified to 'Upload')

message.uploadReferencesExceed.message: You can upload up to 5 images
message.uploadReferencesExceed.description: Error message when the number of uploaded images exceeds the limit

message.uploadReferencesSuccess.description: Success message when images are uploaded successfully

message.uploadReferencesError.message: Image upload failed, please try again later
message.uploadReferencesError.description: Error message when image upload fails

message.startingTask.description: Message when the drawing task starts

message.startTaskSuccess.description: Success message when the task is successfully started

message.startTaskFailed.message: Failed to initiate task, please contact the administrator
message.startTaskFailed.description: Error message when starting the drawing task fails

message.usedUp.message: Your credits are exhausted, please purchase more to continue using

message.generating.description: Message when the image is being generated

message.downloadVideo.description: Message when the image is being generated

message.extendVideo.description: Message when the image is being generated

message.uploadVideoExceed.message: Exceeded the limit for the number of first frame images uploaded
message.uploadVideoExceed.description: Error message when the number of first frame images uploaded exceeds the limit

message.uploadVideoSizeExceed.message: Uploaded file size must not exceed 10MB!
message.uploadVideoSizeExceed.description: Error message when the uploaded file size exceeds 10MB!

message.uploadVideoTypeFailed.message: Uploaded file must be in MP4 format!
message.uploadVideoTypeFailed.description: Error message when the uploaded file is not in MP4 format!

message.uploadStartImageExceed.message: Exceeded the limit for the number of first frame images uploaded
message.uploadStartImageExceed.description: Error message when the number of first frame images uploaded exceeds the limit

message.uploadEndImageExceed.message: Exceeded the limit for the number of last frame images uploaded
message.uploadEndImageExceed.description: Error message when the number of last frame images uploaded exceeds the limit

message.uploadStartImageError.message: Failed to upload first frame image
message.uploadStartImageError.description: Error message when the first frame image upload fails

message.uploadVideoError.description: Error message when the video upload fails

message.uploadEndImageError.message: Failed to upload last frame image
message.uploadEndImageError.description: Error message when the last frame image upload fails

message.uploadDocumentsError.description: Error message when the document upload fails

message.noOperations.description: Message when there are no available operations

message.noTasks.message: No historical tasks, please click to generate video on the left
message.noTasks.description: Message when there are no tasks
